text: Les Grands Ducs (English: The Big Dukes) is a 1996 comedy film directed by Patrice Leconte, starring Jean-Pierre Marielle, Philippe Noiret, Jean Rochefort and Catherine Jacob. ==Plot== George Cox, Victor Vialat and Eddie Carpentier are old and shabby broke actors. They will resume unexpectedly with panache but three small roles in a light comedy, bound for a tour. Shapiron, producer, ruined, will do anything to sabotage the show and thus get the insurance but the three actors will not let the last chance of life. ==Cast== * Jean-Pierre Marielle as George Cox * Philippe Noiret as Victor Vialat * Jean Rochefort as Eddie Carpentier * Catherine Jacob as Carla Milo * Michel Blanc as Shapiron * Clotilde Courau as Juliette * Jacques Mathou as Janvier * Pierre-Arnaud Juin as Pat * Jacques Nolot as Francis Marceau * Albert Delpy as Harry * Marie Pillet as Clémence * Jean-Marie Galey as Markus * Dominique Besnehard as Atlas's Boss == References == ==External links== * Category:French films Category:1996 films Category:1996 comedy films Category:Films directed by Patrice Leconte Category:French comedy films
title: Les Grands Ducs
